betaTip.title: Kiwi AI Beta Version
betaTip.description:
Thank you for using Kiwi AI! Please note that the current version is still in development stage, and we provide all features free for you to try.

If you encounter any issues or have any suggestions during use, please feel free to provide feedback.
betaTip.startTrial: Start Free Trial of Kiwi AI

login.title: Kiwi AI Login
login.registerSuccess: Registration successful! You have been logged in.

sidebar.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to permanently delete the application "{{appName}}"? This action cannot be undone.

chat.placeholderNewApp: Describe the new application you want to create...
chat.generationNote: Note: Generation can take 5-10 minutes. You can safely close this window, the process will continue.

chat.autoFixPrompt: 根据已上传文件修复存在的问题

exchange.collectPageDataTooltip: Click to upload current page information for targeted page content modification
exchange.channelNotSupported: The current application does not support automatic page information collection
